description: This file defines the NoOpAiClient class which implements the AiClient interface, providing a default AI client used when no external API keys are configured. It includes a method suggestImprovements that returns a canned suggestion message.

classes.name: NoOpAiClient
classes.description: A no-operation implementation of the AiClient interface, used as a placeholder when the real AI API is not available.

methods.name: suggestImprovements
methods.description: Returns a default suggestion string for input text.
